A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson does a great job with this latest chapter in the story.  While some in our group found it to be a bit dialogue heavy\, I did not.  I found it to be a very entertaining\, somewhat surprising\, twist in the saga.  It had complexities\, humor\, and action that made it thought provoking\, interesting\, and fun.  I can't wait to see this movie again!
